mapper.select: SELECT hotel.id, hotel.name, hotel.bus_id busId, hotel.shop_id shopId, hotel.phone, hotel.address, hotel.logo, hotel.longitude, hotel.latitude, hotel.`desc`, setting.pay_mode payMode, setting.sms_enable smsEnable, setting.sms_phone smsPhone, setting.notice_enable noticeEnable, setting.bulletin, setting.remnant_room_enable remnantRoomEnable, setting.room_reservation_enable roomReservationEnable, setting.food_pay_mode foodPayMode, setting.reservation_check_out_enable reservationCheckOutEnable, setting.reservation_check_out_phone reservationCheckOutPhone, setting.invoice_categorys invoiceCategorys, setting.created_at createdAt, setting.created_by createdBy, setting.updated_at updatedAt, setting.updated_by updatedBy, 'HOTEL' AS module FROM t_hotel hotel INNER JOIN t_hotel_setting setting ON hotel.id = setting.hotel_id WHERE hotel.id = #{hotelId} AND hotel.mark_modified = 0
